name: Tsunamiboy - A drop of revenge
description:
Tsunamiboy - A drop of revenge

One last drop of rain to save all life from being incinerated by the king of fire, the most evil demon Gorongudam. One last drop of hope to banish this lurking heatwave back to, where it can’t hurt anyone. One last drop of revenge - Tsunamiboy is here for the final reckoning.

Play as a handsome little blob of water, shoot, dodge and grow your dripping power, worthy of a whole army of firemen. In this experience full of action, you must try to gather your strength, all while deflecting the everlasting attacks by packs of mobs and their powerful overlord. This hell of bullets awaits a being cunning enough to ascend from the hunted to the hunter. DEFY THE FIERY FORCES, EXTINGUISH GORONGUDAM, AND BECOME A HERO WORTHY OF EVERY DROP!
